sentences: Kotid on pesu jaoks hästi sobivad.
Tema kõik kotid olid täis kingitusi.
context: The word 'kotid' is the plural form of the Estonian noun 'kott', which means bag or sack. It refers to containers made of flexible material used for carrying things. In Estonian, words ending in '-id' typically indicate plural form, so 'kotid' specifically means multiple bags or sacks.
